verbs.description: The leaders of North and South Korea [V: are] meeting Friday along the line that has divided the peninsula for more than half a century , in what many see as a precursor to the main event – a summit in the coming weeks between Kim Jong - un and President Trump .

[ARG0: The leaders of North and South Korea] are [V: meeting] [ARGM-TMP: Friday] [ARGM-LOC: along the line that has divided the peninsula for more than half a century] , [ARGM-MNR: in what many see as a precursor to the main event – a summit in the coming weeks between Kim Jong - un and President Trump] .

The leaders of North and South Korea are meeting Friday along the line that [V: has] divided the peninsula for more than half a century , in what many see as a precursor to the main event – a summit in the coming weeks between Kim Jong - un and President Trump .

The leaders of North and South Korea are meeting Friday along [ARG0: the line] [R-ARG0: that] has [V: divided] [ARG1: the peninsula] [ARGM-TMP: for more than half a century] , in what many see as a precursor to the main event – a summit in the coming weeks between Kim Jong - un and President Trump .

The leaders of North and South Korea are meeting Friday along the line that has divided the peninsula for more than half a century , in [ARG1: what] [ARG0: many] [V: see] [ARG1: as a precursor to the main event – a summit in the coming weeks between Kim Jong - un and President Trump] .

The leaders of North and South Korea are meeting Friday along the line that has divided the peninsula for more than half a century , in what many see as a precursor to the main event – a summit in the [V: coming] [ARG1: weeks] between Kim Jong - un and President Trump .
